title: My Tasks in Security checklist
content:
1. Injections  (http://example.com/app/accountView?id=’ or ‘1’=’1)
  2. Broken Authentication and session managements
  3. XSS
  4. Insecure data object notations
  5. security misconfiguration
  6. Sensitive data exposures
  7. Missing Function Level Access Control
  8. CSRF
  9. Using components with known vulnerability
  10. unvalidate redirects and forwards
  11. HTTP header injection
  12. Clickjacking
  13. Directory listing
  14. user-agent Content spoofing
  15. Cross-domain AJAX request
  16. security headers
  17. Some S3 Buckets are world readable
  18. SPF/DMARC records
  19. subdomain takeover
  20. SSLv3 Padding Oracle
  21. RCE
  22. SSRF
  23. Username uniqueness
  24. same site sripting
  25. LFI/RFI
